description: This is a Java source file implementing a service class TicketMetricsService for processing uploaded Excel files (.xlsx). The class parses ticket data from uploaded files, computes various metrics such as SLAs, MTTR, and resolution rates, stores parsed data in memory, and provides retrieval methods for metrics and parsed rows with filtering and pagination.

classes.name: TicketMetricsService
classes.description: Main service class for processing Excel files containing ticket data, maintaining in-memory storage, and exposing API-like methods for retrieving metrics and parsed data.

methods.name: computeMetrics
methods.description: Parses the uploaded Excel file, computes ticket metrics such as total tickets, SLA adherence, MTTR, and resolution rates, stores parsed ticket rows, and returns a response DTO with computed metrics.

methods.name: getMetrics
methods.description: Returns stored metric entries filtered optionally by application and month.

methods.name: getParsedRows
methods.description: Returns the last parsed ticket rows filtered by optional application and month, with support for pagination.

methods.name: mapToApiDto
methods.description: Maps an internal TicketMetricEntry object to the API response DTO TicketMetricsApiResponseDTO, formatting fields and converting month code to full month name.
